name: Platform
description: Jump and run along platforms (solid/jump-thru objects).

conditions.name: Is moving
conditions.description: True when the object is moving.

conditions.name: Compare speed
conditions.description: Compare the current speed of the object.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Choose the way to compare the current speed.

params.name: Speed
params.description: The speed, in pixels per second, to compare the current speed to.

conditions.name: Is on floor
conditions.description: True when the object is on top of a solid or platform.

conditions.name: Is jumping
conditions.description: True when the object is moving upwards (i.e. jumping).

conditions.name: Is falling
conditions.description: True when the object is moving downwards (i.e. falling).

conditions.name: Is by wall
conditions.description: Test if the object has a wall to the left or right.

params.name: Side
params.description: Select the side to test for a wall.

conditions.name: Is double-jump enabled
conditions.description: True if double-jump is currently enabled.

conditions.name: On landed
conditions.description: Triggered when first hitting the floor.

conditions.name: Is enabled
conditions.description: Test if the behavior is enabled.

actions.name: Set ignoring input
actions.description: Set whether to ignore the controls for this movement.

params.name: Input
params.description: Set whether to ignore the controls for this movement.

params.name: Max Speed
params.description: The new maximum speed of the object to set, in pixels per second.

params.name: Acceleration
params.description: The new acceleration of the object to set, in pixels per second per second.

params.name: Deceleration
params.description: The new deceleration of the object to set, in pixels per second per second.

params.name: Jump strength
params.description: The new speed at which jumps start, in pixels per second.

params.name: Gravity
params.description: The new acceleration from gravity, in pixels per second per second.

actions.name: Set max fall speed
actions.description: Set the object's maximum fall speed.

params.name: Max fall speed
params.description: The new maximum speed object can reach in freefall, in pixels per second.

params.name: Control
params.description: The movement control to simulate pressing.

actions.name: Set vector X
actions.description: Set the X component of motion.

params.name: Vector X
params.description: The new horizontal movement vector, in pixels per second.

actions.name: Set vector Y
actions.description: Set the Y component of motion.

params.name: Vector Y
params.description: The new vertical movement vector, in pixels per second.

actions.name: Set angle of gravity
actions.description: Change the angle the player falls at.
actions.display_text: Set {my} angle of gravity to [i]{0}[/i] degrees

params.name: Angle
params.description: The angle of gravity in degrees.

actions.name: Set enabled
actions.description: Set whether this behavior is enabled.

params.name: State
params.description: Set whether to enable or disable the behavior.

params.name: State
params.description: Set whether to enable or disable double jumps.

params.name: Jump sustain
params.description: The new jump sustain, in milliseconds to sustain jump velocity for.

actions.name: Set ceiling collision
actions.description: Set how ceiling collisions are handled (stop or preserve momentum)

params.name: Mode
params.description: Set how to handle collisions with the ceiling.

params.name: Default controls
params.description: Whether to enable or disable the behavior default controls.

actions.name: Reset double jump
actions.description: Change whether a double jump is allowed during a jump.

params.name: Double jump allowed
params.description: Whether a double jump is allowed during the current jump.

expressions.name: Speed
expressions.description: The current object speed, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: MaxSpeed
expressions.description: The maximum speed setting, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: Acceleration
expressions.description: The acceleration setting, in pixels per second per second.

expressions.name: Deceleration
expressions.description: The deceleration setting, in pixels per second per second.

expressions.name: JumpStrength
expressions.description: The jump strength setting, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: Gravity
expressions.description: The gravity setting, in pixels per second per second.

expressions.name: MaxFallSpeed
expressions.description: The maximum fall speed setting, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: MovingAngle
expressions.description: The current angle of motion, in degrees.

expressions.name: VectorX
expressions.description: The current X component of motion, in pixels.

expressions.name: VectorY
expressions.description: The current Y component of motion, in pixels.

expressions.name: GravityAngle
expressions.description: The angle of gravity, in degrees.

expressions.name: JumpSustain
expressions.description: The jump sustain property, in milliseconds.
